name: Grail to the Thief: An Interactive Audio Adventure
blurb: Grail to the Thief is an interactive audio adventure for the blind and visually impaired.

rewards.reward: Pledgers will receive acknowledgement on the Kickstarter Thank You page on our website.
Pledgers will receive a DRM-free digital copy of Grail to the Thief and acknowledgement on the Kickstarter Thank You page on our website.

Pledgers will receive a physical copy of Grail to the Thief, a DRM-free digital copy of Grail to the Thief, a Grail to the Thief bumper sticker, and acknowledgement on the Kickstarter Thank You page on our website.

Pledgers will receive a personal voice message from Hank and TEDI thanking you for your support. Also includes a physical copy of Grail to the Thief, a DRM-free digital copy of Grail to the Thief, a Grail to the Thief bumper sticker, and acknowledgement on the Kickstarter Thank You page on our website.

Pledgers will receive a 12x18 color poster on heavy matte stock. Also includes a personal voice message from Hank and TEDI thanking you for your support, a physical copy of Grail to the Thief, a DRM-free digital copy of Grail to the Thief, a Grail to the Thief bumper sticker, and acknowledgement on the Kickstarter Thank You page on our website.

Pledgers will receive a digital copy of the script for Grail to the Thief. Also includes a 12x18 color poster on heavy matte stock, personal voice message from Hank and TEDI thanking you for your support, a physical copy of Grail to the Thief, a DRM-free digital copy of Grail to the Thief, a Grail to the Thief bumper sticker, and acknowledgement on the Kickstarter Thank You page on our website.

Pledgers will receive a physical print copy of the script for Grail to the Thief. Also includes a digital copy of the script for Grail to the Thief, a 12x18 color poster on heavy matte stock, a personal voice message from Hank and TEDI thanking you for your support, a physical copy of Grail to the Thief, a DRM-free digital copy of Grail to the Thief, a Grail to the Thief bumper sticker, and acknowledgement on the Kickstarter Thank You page on our website.

Pledgers will receive a physical Braille copy of the script for Grail to the Thief. Also includes a digital copy of the script for Grail to the Thief, a 12x18 color poster on heavy matte stock, a personal voice message from Hank and TEDI thanking you for your support, a physical copy of Grail to the Thief, a DRM-free digital copy of Grail to the Thief, a Grail to the Thief bumper sticker, and acknowledgement on the Kickstarter Thank You page on our website.

Pledgers will name a minor in-game character (keep it PG). Also includes your choice of a physical print or Braille copy of the script for Grail to the Thief, a digital copy of the script for Grail to the Thief, a 12x18 color poster on heavy matte stock, a personal voice message from Hank and TEDI thanking you for your support, a physical copy of Grail to the Thief, a DRM-free digital copy of Grail to the Thief, a Grail to the Thief bumper sticker, and acknowledgement on the Kickstarter Thank You page on our website.

We will write, record, and develop a 5-minute interactive audio adventure with the pledger serving as a consultant (no racism, sexism, hate speech, explicit sexual content, etc.). Also includes naming a minor in-game character (keep it PG), your choice of a physical print or Braille copy of the script for Grail to the Thief, a digital copy of the script for Grail to the Thief, a 12x18 color poster on heavy matte stock, a personal voice message from Hank and TEDI thanking you for your support, a physical copy of Grail to the Thief, a DRM-free digital copy of Grail to the Thief, a Grail to the Thief bumper sticker, and acknowledgement on the Kickstarter Thank You page on our website.

We will write, record, and develop a 15-minute interactive audio adventure with the pledger serving as a consultant (no racism, sexism, hate speech, explicit sexual content, etc.). Also includes naming a minor in-game character (keep it PG), your choice of a physical print or Braille copy of the script for Grail to the Thief, a digital copy of the script for Grail to the Thief, a 12x18 color poster on heavy matte stock, a personal voice message from Hank and TEDI thanking you for your support, a physical copy of Grail to the Thief, a DRM-free digital copy of Grail to the Thief, a Grail to the Thief bumper sticker, and acknowledgement on the Kickstarter Thank You page on our website.
